name: I â™¡ Mabry / Design Rant
description:
Our brand font at Happy Money is Mabry. It's the font that we live with on a daily basis. Typically with a new brand font there is a honeymoon period, followed by a drought of obligation. But, with Mabry, I just keep falling more and more in love. 

I <3 Mabry, and this rant is why I love it so much.

Props to Colophon, for designing Mabry.
